text: Hagi Ra Anumzamo'a huno, Babiloni vahe'mota mago agonagna huta hankavenentake hu'neta maka mopafi vahera zamazeri haviza hu'naze. Hagi menina Nagra nazana rusute'na hara hunegante'na, kazerite'na katrenugenka zavenitegati tamisankeno tevemo'a kagrira tehana hanigenka, mago agonama afe tevemo'ma teosa hiankna hugahane.
